item.title: Airtel / International Roaming / Not receiving OTPs or SMS from India while abroad or in USA?
item.description: TLDR Level up on how to continue to receive OTPs and SMS notifications free of cost on your Airtel phones from India. Why did I write this article? Recently my mother who travels back and forth between India and USA came to a shock when she receved a Rs.18,000 (approx. $230 USD) bill for the month of July from Airtel. This article is a summary of my discovery and learning to better understand what went wrong and how we can avoid such expensive bills in the future.
